name: Owl On His Own
description:
Inspired by Le Petit Prince and Yume Nikki, Owl On His Own is an adventure walking-simulator game where you play as an owl on his life quest to find a drugstore, buy some flu medicine for his sick mother, and come back home by himself. Find paths, talk to random foes, read many signs and get lost and confused as you travel around the Amazon forest in this 1-3 hours game made using RPG maker VX Ace.

Click here and listen to the whole game soundtrack on Youtube!
